thread.section_title: Le 123 Sebastopol - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Friendly
thread.title_full: Friendly - Review of Le 123 Sebastopol - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: traveljunkie13-65
title: Friendly
text: Stayed here for 1 night, midweek, 14th March. This hotel is in a great position for exploring Paris - short walk from Gare du Nord if you come by Eurostar. The staff were warm and welcoming and let us check in early. The Breakfast buffet is lovely offering a huge variety of fresh fruit, salad and breads. There is a little cinema and gym in the cellar which is quite quirky although we didn't use them. I can recommend the cocktails in the evening - quite pricey but very tasty! Would definitely recommend this hotel for a Paris visit. (This is actually the 2nd Astotel hotel I've stayed in in Paris and they are a lovely chain that has individual hotels that don't feel like a chain at all.)
